about_the_game:
A 2.5D shooter divided into 4 screens, giving you control of your cyborg hero character inside of the rooms, a 3D view of those rooms that allows you to rearrange the world around you, a circuit board that lets you rewire your character's circuits, and just a map of the game world.

Your HOMELAND has fallen, and is being invaded by enemy soldiers. As a last resort, your government has put all their resources into creating YOU, the space bending, self wiring cyborg; and final line of defense.

short_description: Navigate this 2.5D shooter through 4 screens, allowing you to rearrange the map, and rewire your abilities to defend your HOMELAND. There is a free demo available showcasing the room movement and navigation mechanics, try it out!
